entry.title: Hydrologic Outlook issued May 05 at 11:59AM MDT by NWS
entry.summary: Steady rises on area streams and rivers will continue into the weekend. Moderate to heavy rain on Friday through Saturday, will result in additional opportunities for stream and river rises. Temperatures will be cooling by Saturday, which will slow snow melt, resulting in creek levels beginning a decline into next week.
